name: hackathon-todo-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Hackathon Todo Application with Next.js frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && python -m black . && python -m flake8 .
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && cd .. && cd backend && rm -rf venv && cd ../..
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ..

author: Hackathon Team
